data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
Hello,

I am looking for advice from experts here. I have Honeywell Novar controller recently installed in our systems.

Can I use any 3rd party cloud based BMS to integrate with Honeywell controllers? We also have multiple locations with other types of controllers.

I see that many 3rd party BMS systems boast of integrating data from different controllers if they have BACnet enabled protocols. I have no idea how that works. Is this true and how easy/difficult it is?

Can any guru here explain if I can invest in a 3rd party cloud based BMS that will be able to integrate the data from Honeywell controllers and see all data at a single platform. Kindly suggest if you have any good 3rd party platform that is useful and easy to use.
